Message:
This rotten world is
finally being purged...!
Ahh...! I’ve never seen
a more beautiful sight...!

At times, I can hear
screams of terror
ring through the air...

But, karma does tend to hurt.
This is punishment, after all.

This ugly world
and all its filthy sinners
are melting to nothing
in my bubbles...!”

As I destroy this world
all for you...!
